Class Battle

java.lang.Object
game.Battle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Battle extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a battle session in the game.

A battle consists of a hero, a sequence of combat levels, and a tracker for the current level. The hero is instantiated and equipped at the start, and levels are generated based on the selected difficulty.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Battle

      public Battle(levels.Difficulty difficulty)
      Constructs a new battle session with the specified difficulty.

      Initializes the Hero and equips them with a Weapon. Generates a fixed number of combat levels using FixatedLevelBuilder.

      Parameters:
      difficulty - the difficulty setting for the battle
